text: nalu niliyan sambandha kara ganimin ganwathura aadhara ekathu kirima mewannakata hondama udaharanayaki.wimalasiri perera samanga nithara katha kirimedi mata ohuge adahas udahas sithum pathum aadiya hondin therum ganimata haki wiya.
